tutorial.speak:
Forms are a great feature of CHUMS and B1.Church. You can build People forms for your database or Stand Alone forms for your website or to link to. To begin, navigate to the CHUMS dashboard.
Go to settings.
Choose Forms.
Click on the plus sign in the top right corner.
Give the form a name. We’ll call this form "Baptism". It will be a custom field in our People file.
Choose "People" in the drop-down menu.
Be sure to click "Save".
Now we will put the questions within the "Baptism" custom field.
Click on the plus sign in the top right corner to add a question.
Add a provider from the drop-down menu. This is where you will choose the type of question you are asking.
Write a title. This is the question you are asking.
Add a description.
Don’t forget to click save.
You can make as many questions as you like. In this example, we will add the question of what date the person was baptized.
Note that the People forms do not have a link associated with them. The links are associated with the Stand Alone forms.
Go to your People files to look at the custom field you just made titled Baptism. Click on any name.
You can see the custom field at the bottom of the file.
Click on Baptism and fill out the form.
Once the field is complete, it will show up at the bottom of each file.
Now let’s go back to Forms and make a Stand Alone form.
This form will be for the Ladies Retreat.
Choose Stand Alone for this form.
You can make the form Public or Restricted. The restricted mode allows you to choose who you want to allow to fill out the form.
You can set a time frame that the form will be available.
Choose a begin date and an end date.
Write a thank you note for people who fill out the form.
Don’t forget to hit save.
Now click on the form to add questions to the form.
Add as many questions as you like.
If you want to take payments with this form, choose payments under questions.
Be sure to save.
Now let’s look at Form Members to see who has access to see the completed forms and edit the form.
You can set Permission to Admin or View only and turn on or off email notifications.
To add a person, just search for someone and add them.
Now let’s go over to B1 to add this form to a webpage.
Click on your icon in the top right corner.
Choose Admin portal.
Choose Website.
Click the plus in the top right.
